p: All children received standard treatment for pneumonia, which included supportive care, and where deemed necessary, invasive or non-invasive ventilation, inotropes and antibiotics. Intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIG) was given to children with persistent fever and intravenous pulse methylprednisolone (MTP) was given to children with significant disease i.e. rapidly increasing respiratory distress, at the discretion of the treating physician.
